game.name: VOID81: The Backrooms
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: VOID81: The Backrooms is a 3D platform game with survival horror elements, where you explore ever-changing levels, solve puzzles, avoid dangers, and traverse surreal worlds inspired by the retro atmosphere of the 1980s.
game.shortDescriptionEn: VOID81: The Backrooms is a 3D platform game with survival horror elements, where you explore ever-changing levels, solve puzzles, avoid dangers, and traverse surreal worlds inspired by the retro atmosphere of the 1980s.
